Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer

Class RenderImg

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer.RenderImg
@Deprecated public class RenderImg extends Object
Deprecated.
This is a Deprecated but still functional imgClass RenderImg takes in 1 Image and renders that one image properly, adjusting for the image size and rendering at a certain location
Author:
Marwan Mohamed
